price: 9. Ee iska leh Mulkiga (iyo Maamulka) samooyinka iyo arlada! Alle wax walba waa u Jeedaa.
arabic: ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ شَهِيدٌ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: alladhī lahu mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wal-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin shahīdun
